profile.en:
President of Millennium's Game Development Department.

Yuzu struggles with social anxiety and finds it difficult to deal with people, so she spends most of her time in a cabinet in the Game Development Department. Despite that, her passion for games is second to none. She loves both making and playing games.
profile.jp:
ミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、ゲーム開発部の部長。

誰かと会話したり接することを非常に苦手としており、そのため外に出ることもほとんどなく、大半の時間をゲーム開発部の部室にあるロッカーの中で過ごしている。ゲームを作ることもプレイすることも好きで、ゲームに対する情熱は並大抵のものではない。
profile.thai:
President of Millennium's Game Development Department.

Yuzu struggles with social anxiety and finds it difficult to deal with people, so she spends most of her time in a cabinet in the Game Development Department. Despite that, her passion for games is second to none. She loves both making and playing games.
profile.ko:
President of Millennium's Game Development Department.

Yuzu struggles with social anxiety and finds it difficult to deal with people, so she spends most of her time in a cabinet in the Game Development Department. Despite that, her passion for games is second to none. She loves both making and playing games.
profile.zh_tw:
千年科學學園所屬，遊戲開發部的部長。

非常害怕與人對話，因此幾乎沒有到外面去，大部分的時間都是在遊戲開發部的置物櫃中度過。
製作遊戲和玩遊戲都很喜歡，對遊戲的熱情非同小可。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
千年游戏开发部的部长。

害怕与人打交道的社交恐惧症少女。大部分的时间都是在游戏开发部的置物柜中度过。但是对游戏的热情可不输任何人。
制作游戏和玩游戏，她全都喜欢。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
千年科学学园所属，游戏开发部的部长。

非常害怕与人对话，因此几乎没有到外面去，大部分的时间都是在游戏开发部的置物柜中度过。
制作游戏和玩游戏都很喜欢，对游戏的热情非同小可。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
千年游戏开发部的部长。

害怕与人打交道的社交恐惧症少女。大部分的时间都是在游戏开发部的置物柜中度过。但是对游戏的热情可不输任何人。
制作游戏和玩游戏，她全都喜欢。

desc.en: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲開心地玩著遊戲開發部的前作<傳說年代記>。遊戲開發部全員看她玩得這麼開心都大受感動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.

desc.ko: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠討論將愛麗絲偽裝成千年學生計劃的可行性。桃井負責去拿到假學生證，而綠和柚子負責教愛麗絲“說話”，希望將其高度機械化的語音模式修改過來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.jp: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井先行離開，綠為如何教愛麗絲說話而苦惱著。這時，愛麗絲則發現了一本曾經寫著他們做的遊戲的雜誌。綠於是決定讓愛麗絲玩玩自己的遊戲，試著用遊戲中的對話教會愛麗絲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。

desc.en: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.

desc.en: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.jp: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.

desc.ko: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.zh_tw: 在桃井和綠兩人的幫助下，愛麗絲在三小時內通關了True End。兩人問及愛麗絲對遊戲的評價時，愛麗絲認為遊戲很有意思，聽到此言的柚子終於從櫃子裡出來了。柚子真誠地對愛麗絲道了謝。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.jp: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.thai: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.ko: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.zh_tw: 因為耽誤到時間的關係，朱音和花凛也從封鎖中解放出來。就這樣，遊戲開發部又再次陷入危機。這時，愛麗絲及時現身解救遊戲開發部，讓一行人成功進入學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.jp: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.

desc.ko: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.zh_tw: 優香命令將收繳來的機器人加入戰場，明日奈的戰力也絕非等閒之輩，工程部無力壓制狙擊手花凜，朱音也正在趕來。在似乎無望之際，眾人想起了之前會議的內容。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。

desc.en: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.jp: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.

desc.zh_tw: 眾人認為計劃的容錯率完全為零，因而需要準備後備計劃。停電後，愛麗絲檢測到時機成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.jp: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.

desc.zh_tw: 優香等人終於到齊，宣佈了要把遊戲開發部關禁閉的處分。愛麗絲突然出現，以光之劍破除了障礙；花凜也被重新壓制。愛麗絲特別提到，在所有RPG遊戲中，勇者是從來不會放棄同伴的。受到鼓勵的眾人開始迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。

desc.en: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.jp: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.thai: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. desc.ko: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部開發的<傳說年代記2>，在選拔千年學園優秀發明的<千年大賞>中獲得特別獎，因而免於遊戲開發部的廢社危機。在所有人都很開心的時候，安裝了<G.Bible>的遊戲機自己動了起來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。

desc.en: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.jp: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲對女僕裝有了心理陰影，與尼祿戰鬥導致的損壞也被他們妥善處理了。塵埃落定後，眾人開始觀看比賽的現場直播。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与尼禄战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与宁瑠战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: The result was announced by the Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.jp: The result was announced by the Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.

desc.ko: The result was announced by the Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.zh_tw: 比賽結果由工程部的亞都梨釋出，總共有七個獲獎專案。然而七個播報玩都不見開發部的TSC2，桃井絕望之下用槍掃射了螢幕。大家都很感傷，柚子雖然表示自己有勇氣回到宿舍，但愛麗絲的去向卻成為了眾人最擔心的一點。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 比赛结果由工程部的柯托莉发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报玩都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 比赛结果由工程部的亚都梨发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报玩都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 比赛结果由工程部的亚都梨发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报玩都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。

desc.en: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On site, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.jp: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On site, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.

desc.ko: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On site, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.zh_tw: 優香拜訪遊戲開發部，慶祝所有人取得獎項。因為電視機被打穿，眾人在手機上觀看了直播。直播中，頒獎員高度讚揚了TSC2作為復古RPG的要素，並由此授予了他們特別獎。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。

desc.en: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.jp: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.thai: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.ko: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部最終免於廢社，就連優香和真紀都給出了好評，最熱門的兩條評論也滿是對TSC2的稱讚。優香宣佈了暫緩廢社的決定，並向桃井抱歉。愛麗絲正式成為開發部成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。

desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.jp: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.thai: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.ko: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部為了解讀暗號閱覽<G.Bible>而向<貝里塔斯>諮詢。真紀回答說，如果想解讀暗號，需要有被學生會扣押的駭客工具<鏡子>。一行人為了拿回<鏡子>，便前往由女僕部看守的學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.thai: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.ko: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯的晴首先為大家帶來了壞消息：桃井的遊戲存檔不可恢復，桃井聽到立刻哭了起來。不過，真紀通過分析文件元數據，確認了文件的真實性，但卻無法破解密碼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.thai: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.ko: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.zh_tw: 真紀認為，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密碼，應該還能行得通。然而一款正是照此設計的工具“鏡子”卻被學生會沒收。因為是部長製作的工具，貝里塔斯也打算將其取回——這與開發部眾人不謀而合，於是他們便提出要突襲千年學生會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井還對是否參與有所顧忌，但綠已經決定：遊戲開發部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保護這一切。愛麗絲從玩過的四十多款RPG中得出結論，冒險路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，並希望老師能夠去找工程師部一起行動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长日鞠告诉她的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长阳葵告诉她的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 朱音好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长阳葵告诉她的。

desc.en: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.thai: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.ko: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_tw: 經過幾輪問答後，優香同意讓愛麗絲成為正式成員。但她威脅說，如果還是做不出好遊戲就會關閉遊戲開發部。遊戲開發部全員再次前往廢墟尋找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she was being kidnapped or not and was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.jp: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she was being kidnapped or not and was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.thai: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she was being kidnapped or not and was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.ko: Yuuka first whispered to ask whether she was being kidnapped or not and was cut off by Momoi and Midori. Yuuka had to restarted the questioning.
desc.zh_tw: 優香首先偷偷問了愛麗絲“你是不是被遊戲開發部綁架來的”這個問題，被桃井和綠兩人攔下。優香不得不重新開始審問。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃井和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃井和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香首先偷偷问了爱丽丝“你是不是被游戏开发部绑架来的”这个问题，被桃井和绿两人拦下。优香不得不重新开始审问。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香开始提问，桃井则紧张地看着爱丽丝，然而即使这样爱丽丝仍然出了差错。

desc.en: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Club. Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.jp: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Club. Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.thai: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Club. Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.ko: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Club. Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.zh_tw: 雖然說話很奇怪，但優香業已感受到愛麗絲對遊戲的熱愛，由此承認了她是遊戲開發部的一員。然而優香表示，由於規定突然變更，若月底拿不出成績，無論什麼社團都會被廢除。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。

desc.en: After Yuuka left, Yuzu got out of her wardrobe, stating that she would like to go to the Ruins to find the book G.Bible. She agreed the idea of protecting the club together purposed by Momoi and Midori.
desc.jp: After Yuuka left, Yuzu got out of her wardrobe, stating that she would like to go to the Ruins to find the book G.Bible. She agreed the idea of protecting the club together purposed by Momoi and Midori.

desc.ko: After Yuuka left, Yuzu got out of her wardrobe, stating that she would like to go to the Ruins to find the book G.Bible. She agreed the idea of protecting the club together purposed by Momoi and Midori.
desc.zh_tw: 優香走後，柚子從櫃子裡出來，表示要前往廢墟找到《G.Bible》一書。她同意桃井和綠兩人的想法，想要一起保護社團。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香走后，柚子从柜子里出来，表示要前往废墟找到《G.Bible》一书。她同意桃井和绿两人的想法，想要一起保护社团。

desc.en: Thanks to Aris, the Game Development Department easily defeats the hostile robots in the ruins this time.
desc.jp: Thanks to Aris, the Game Development Department easily defeats the hostile robots in the ruins this time.
desc.thai: Thanks to Aris, the Game Development Department easily defeats the hostile robots in the ruins this time.
desc.ko: Thanks to Aris, the Game Development Department easily defeats the hostile robots in the ruins this time.
desc.zh_tw: 這次和上次不同，由於愛麗絲的大展身手，遊戲開發部輕鬆打倒了廢墟的機器人後，朝向目的地前進。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 这次和上次不同，由于爱丽丝的大展身手，游戏开发部轻松打倒了废墟的机器人后，朝向目的地前进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 这次和上次不同，由于爱丽丝的大展身手，游戏开发部轻松打倒了废墟的机器人后，朝向目的地前进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 这次和上次不同，由于爱丽丝的大展身手，游戏开发部轻松打倒了废墟的机器人后，朝向目的地前进。

desc.en: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.jp: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.thai: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.ko: Outside the factory, everyone was met with fierce attack from the robots. Midori wanted to retreat but was rejected by Momoi. She thought that the robots would eventually gather and made the situation far worse than now. Encouraged by Aris and Momoi, everyone decided to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 在工廠外，眾人遭到了機器人的猛烈進攻。綠提出撤退，但被桃井否決，認為機器人最終會聚集過來，使情況雪上加霜。在愛麗絲與桃井的鼓勵下，眾人最終決定應戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。绿提出撤退，但被桃井否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在爱丽丝与桃井的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。绿提出撤退，但被桃井否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在爱丽丝与桃井的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在工厂外，众人遭到了机器人的猛烈进攻。绿提出撤退，但被桃井否决，认为机器人最终会聚集过来，使情况雪上加霜。在爱丽丝与桃井的鼓励下，众人最终决定应战。

desc.en: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程师部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程师部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。

desc.en: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.jp: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.

desc.ko: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲熟練地使用從沒碰過的軌道砲，壓制了工程師部。工程師部的部長詠葉見狀，便害怕起愛麗絲卓越的身體素質。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程师部。工程师部的部长歌原见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.thai: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.ko: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.zh_tw: 詠葉等工程師部的學生歡迎了開發部一行人。響主動提出要為愛麗絲找武器，但愛麗絲很快把注意力放到了一門軌道炮上。亞都梨主動為愛麗絲介紹了這門傑作，提到由於資金問題這門大砲的研發已經終止。工程師部眾人本以為愛麗絲無法舉起它，但後者不僅拿起了它，還不小心給房頂開了個洞；不得已，工程師部決定測試遊戲開發部眾人的能力，達標後才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌原等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。柯托莉主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: Hibiki continued adjusting for Aris, yet Utaha noticed that Aris was in fact a machine and was worried for her abilities.

desc.zh_tw: 響繼續為愛麗絲的使用進行著一些調整，而詠葉察覺到，愛麗絲似乎實際上是一具機械，並對她所具有的能力感到擔心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 响继续为爱丽丝的使用进行着一些调整，而歌原察觉到，爱丽丝似乎实际上是一具机械，并对她所具有的能力感到担心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 响继续为爱丽丝的使用进行着一些调整，而咏叶察觉到，爱丽丝似乎实际上是一具机械，并对她所具有的能力感到担心。

desc.en: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.jp: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.thai: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.ko: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.zh_tw: 結果事與願違，<G.Bible>的内容只是「請熱愛遊戲吧」這句單純的句子。這讓遊戲開發部的學生們跌入失落的深淵。在愛麗絲的打氣下，遊戲開發部重新振作起來,著手開發<傳說年代記2>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。

desc.en: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.jp: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.thai: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.ko: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人滿心歡喜打開了檔案，但內容令人大失所望。除了眾所周知的“用心做遊戲”外再無其他。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人满心欢喜打开了文件，但内容令人大失所望。除了众所周知的“用心做游戏”外再无其他。

desc.en: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.jp: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.thai: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.ko: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部眾人感到十分沮喪。愛麗絲表達了對TSC的喜愛，因此想要與眾人將TSC2製作下去。柚子本人也罕見地表達了支援。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。

desc.en: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.jp: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.thai: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.ko: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子回想起了TSC發行後幾天漫天的差評言論，自尊心大受損傷。這時門突然被敲想，柚子本以為是憤怒的玩家上門，卻不想迎來了桃井和綠，兩位不僅對TSC評價很高，而且將會成為開發部的成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.jp: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.thai: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.ko: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子表達了對其他三人的感謝，表達了自己與夥伴一起做遊戲的喜悅之情。在桃井的號召下，眾人在開始了不到一週的遊戲開發。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。

desc.en: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to start hacking.
desc.jp: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to start hacking.

Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. desc.zh_tw: 兩小時前的作戰會議中，晴提到到達保管所的地方唯有通過電梯到達，然而電梯和頂樓各區域的門只能通過指紋驗證，且驗證失敗還會觸發多種機關。為了突破安全系統，響提出用EMP手雷癱瘓所有系統，到時貝里塔斯即可開始駭入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。

desc.en: Akane thought herself meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.jp: Akane thought herself meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.

desc.zh_tw: 朱音以為碰見了桃井和綠，實際上卻是工程師部的真紀與亞都梨。朱音向優香請求確認監控狀態，這時大家才意識到監控已被駭入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜以为碰见了桃井和绿，实际上却是工程师部的真纪与柯托莉。茜向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音以为碰见了桃井和绿，实际上却是工程师部的真纪与亚都梨。朱音向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka realized the trap set by Aris too late. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they were met with other Seminar members.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka realized the trap set by Aris too late. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they were met with other Seminar members.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠到達了電梯前，與此同時朱音等人卻因指紋不符而被一同關了起來。這時優香才意識到愛麗絲的問題，而桃井、綠與老師三人已經到達頂樓，並順利用指紋開鎖，但還是遇到了學生會成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时茜等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时朱音等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。

desc.en: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.jp: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.thai: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.ko: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人抵達目的地——位於廢墟的工廠。愛麗絲在那裡靠直覺找到儲存<G.Bible>的電腦，並且成功把資料下載到遊戲機裡。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。

desc.en: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.jp: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.thai: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.ko: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.zh_tw: 眾人到達了工廠，但愛麗絲卻突然記起了什麼，自顧自的行動。眾人跟隨著愛麗絲，找到了一台搭載著“Divi: Sion”系統的電腦。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。

desc.en: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.jp: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.thai: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.ko: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.zh_tw: 電腦認出了愛麗絲，但突然電量不足即將關機，數據被毀在即；為了得到其存儲的《G.Bible》，桃井獻出了自己的遊戲機與存檔。數據得以保存，但需密碼才可訪問；桃井大聲抱怨，結果引來了機器人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。

desc.en: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人勉強趕上截止期限，完成了<傳說年代記2>的開發。上傳遊戲後，遊戲開發部社團活動室遭到來歷不明的槍擊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。

desc.en: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.jp: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.thai: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.ko: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.zh_tw: 對社團活動室發動槍擊的，是女僕部的部長寧瑠。寧瑠說對上次的戰鬥大感興趣，並對愛麗絲提出挑戰。經過好一陣混戰才滿足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长尼禄。尼禄说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。

desc.en: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.thai: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.ko: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部眾人終於在最後一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要將demo上傳到網上供大家下載。評論開始湧來，下載量也在激增，而就在眾人緊張不安時，社團突然被幾發炮彈擊中。眾人開始迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a battle. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer be investigated. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light in advance.
desc.jp: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a battle. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer be investigated. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light in advance.
desc.thai: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a battle. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer be investigated. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light in advance.
desc.ko: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a battle. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer be investigated. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light in advance.
desc.zh_tw: 尼祿前來挑戰開發部眾人。尼祿先是稱讚了柚子的勇氣，然後向愛麗絲髮出挑戰，提出只要能打敗她，以前的事情就一筆勾銷。尼祿還沒反應過來，愛麗絲就搶先發射了光之劍。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄前来挑战开发部众人。尼禄先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。尼禄还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠前来挑战开发部众人。宁瑠先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。宁瑠还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠前来挑战开发部众人。宁瑠先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。宁瑠还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。

desc.en: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru didn't pursue afterwards.
desc.jp: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru didn't pursue afterwards.
desc.thai: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru didn't pursue afterwards.
desc.ko: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru didn't pursue afterwards.
desc.zh_tw: 雖然尼祿在近戰方面優勢顯著，但愛麗絲透過將光之劍朝向地面開炮，在自傷48%的情況下先行撤離。尼祿最後決定不再追究。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然尼禄在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。尼禄最后决定不再追究。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然宁瑠在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。宁瑠最后决定不再追究。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然宁瑠在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。宁瑠最后决定不再追究。

desc.en: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.jp: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.thai: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.ko: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲玩遊戲開發部學生推薦的遊戲玩了一整晚，已經學會人類說話的口吻了。桃井遞給愛麗絲各種能偽裝成千年學園學生的物品。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝玩游戏开发部学生推荐的游戏玩了一整晚，已经学会人类说话的口吻了。桃井递给爱丽丝各种能伪装成千年学园学生的物品。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝玩游戏开发部学生推荐的游戏玩了一整晚，已经学会人类说话的口吻了。桃井递给爱丽丝各种能伪装成千年学园学生的物品。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝玩游戏开发部学生推荐的游戏玩了一整晚，已经学会人类说话的口吻了。桃井递给爱丽丝各种能伪装成千年学园学生的物品。

desc.en: Yuzu reintroduced herself to Aris and wanted to recommend RPG games to her. Upon hearing this, the other two joined in too. Aris played games day and night, completing them at an incredible rate.
desc.jp: Yuzu reintroduced herself to Aris and wanted to recommend RPG games to her. Upon hearing this, the other two joined in too. Aris played games day and night, completing them at an incredible rate.
desc.thai: Yuzu reintroduced herself to Aris and wanted to recommend RPG games to her. Upon hearing this, the other two joined in too. Aris played games day and night, completing them at an incredible rate.
desc.ko: Yuzu reintroduced herself to Aris and wanted to recommend RPG games to her. Upon hearing this, the other two joined in too. Aris played games day and night, completing them at an incredible rate.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子重新向愛麗絲介紹了自己，並想要為愛麗絲推薦RPG遊戲，結果話一出口三人就吵了起來。愛麗絲日夜不停地打著遊戲，以超乎常人的速度通關了一部又一部。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子重新向爱丽丝介绍了自己，并想要为爱丽丝推荐RPG游戏，结果话一出口三人就吵了起来。爱丽丝日夜不停地打着游戏，以超乎常人的速度通关了一部又一部。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子重新向爱丽丝介绍了自己，并想要为爱丽丝推荐RPG游戏，结果话一出口三人就吵了起来。爱丽丝日夜不停地打着游戏，以超乎常人的速度通关了一部又一部。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子重新向爱丽丝介绍了自己，并想要为爱丽丝推荐RPG游戏，结果话一出口三人就吵了起来。爱丽丝日夜不停地打着游戏，以超乎常人的速度通关了一部又一部。

desc.en: When everything woke up, Aris had been much better in the way of her speech. Momoi also got the falsified student ID card. Then, Momoi purposed to take Aris around the Millennium.

desc.zh_tw: 大家醒來時，愛麗絲的說話方式已經正常了許多，桃井也拿到了偽造的學生證。這時，桃井提出要帶愛麗絲參觀千年。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家醒来时，爱丽丝的说话方式已经正常了许多，桃井也拿到了伪造的学生证。这时，桃井提出要带爱丽丝参观千年。

desc.en: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人順利取得<鏡子>之後，卻在扣押品保管所遭遇女僕部的部長寧瑠。多虧柚子急中生智成功騙過寧瑠，遊戲開發部才得以順利返回社團活動室。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长尼禄。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过尼禄，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长宁瑠。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过宁瑠，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长宁瑠。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过宁瑠，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。

desc.en: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.jp: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.thai: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.ko: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.zh_tw: 三人成功到達了保管室，卻意外發現尼祿回來了。驚慌失措的眾人不小心發出了聲音引起注意，幸好柚子及時到來，騙過了尼祿使其離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现尼禄回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了尼禄使其离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现宁瑠回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了宁瑠使其离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现宁瑠回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了宁瑠使其离开。

desc.en: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.thai: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.ko: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_tw: 戰鬥後，朱音對任務失敗一事向寧瑠道歉，但寧瑠卻反而表示，對和女僕部打得不相上下的愛麗絲感興趣。另一方面，回到社團活動室的遊戲開發部一行人試著使用<鏡子>解讀<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 战斗后，茜对任务失败一事向尼禄道歉，但尼禄却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 战斗后，朱音对任务失败一事向宁瑠道歉，但宁瑠却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 战斗后，朱音对任务失败一事向宁瑠道歉，但宁瑠却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.jp: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.thai: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.ko: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.zh_tw: 朱音為接下該項委託給大家蒙羞抱歉，尼祿則表示大可不必，並表示委託已被取消。尼祿對愛麗絲特別感興趣，讓明日奈等人去查清遊戲開發部全員的資料。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，尼禄则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。尼禄对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，宁瑠则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。宁瑠对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 朱音为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，宁瑠则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。宁瑠对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人收到了貝里塔斯最新的提取結果，眾人立刻開始閱讀。但書中內容令眾人大失所望。

desc.en: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.zh_tw: 在優香和乃愛的協助下，遊戲開發部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正當工程師部和貝里塔斯等抵禦來自各地的敵人之際。桃井、綠、柚子、老師企圖在陽葵的協助下喚醒愛麗絲，於是便進入了愛麗絲的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在优香和诺亚的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程师部和贝里塔斯等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在日鞠的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程师部和贝里塔斯等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在阳葵的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程师部和贝里塔斯等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在阳葵的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。

desc.en: Rio explained that Yuuka didn't feel good after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka scolded Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Rio explained that Yuuka didn't feel good after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka scolded Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.

The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_tw: 乃愛解釋稱，優香覺得不插手總感覺哪裡不對，於是前來協助。優香呵斥了莉央，說明會嚴厲追究她的責任。工程部此時也準備就緒，帶上了改裝好的前衛君MK.2前來協助。Key重啟系統，開始重新確保資源並將兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前衛君和工程師部干擾。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 诺亚解释称，优香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。优香呵斥了莉央，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程师部干扰。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 乃爱解释称，优香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。优香呵斥了莉央，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程师部干扰。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 乃爱解释称，优香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。优香呵斥了莉央，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程师部干扰。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.

She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.

desc.zh_tw: 在Key以為仍有機會時，陽葵突然出現並解釋C&C和英美已經將入口堵上，Key無法召集兵力進入高塔。莉央驚訝於陽葵竟未逃走，而陽葵則表示早已對此有所預料。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在Key以为仍有机会时，日鞠突然出现并解释C&C和艾米已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉央惊讶于日鞠竟未逃走，而日鞠则表示早已对此有所预料。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在Key以为仍有机会时，阳葵突然出现并解释C&C和英美已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉央惊讶于阳葵竟未逃走，而阳葵则表示早已对此有所预料。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在Key以为仍有机会时，阳葵突然出现并解释C&C和英美已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉央惊讶于阳葵竟未逃走，而阳葵则表示早已对此有所预料。

desc.en: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started creating a tunnel.
desc.jp: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started creating a tunnel.

desc.ko: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started creating a tunnel.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵指出在當前狀態下Key有可能會徹底接管愛麗絲的人格，因而目前的最佳方案應當是將愛麗絲喚醒。至於如何喚醒，陽葵提出讓遊戲開發部和老師一起潛入機器的意識和資料庫中，在那找回愛麗絲。莉央指出了其中的危險，但眾人義無反顧；在千年幾乎全部有生作戰力量的保護下，陽葵開始尋找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，日鞠提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，日鞠开始寻找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，阳葵提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，阳葵开始寻找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，阳葵提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，阳葵开始寻找其中的突破口。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部抵達莉央所在的地方，在準備救出愛麗絲的瞬間，未來的存在「Key」出現且掌控了埃裡都，局勢因此開始步向危機。就在莉央準備犧牲自己來挽回一切時，乃愛和優香出現了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部抵达莉央所在的地方，在准备救出爱丽丝的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉央准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，诺亚和优香出现了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部抵达莉央所在的地方，在准备救出爱丽丝的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉央准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，乃爱和优香出现了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部抵达莉央所在的地方，在准备救出爱丽丝的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉央准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，乃爱和优香出现了。

desc.en: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.jp: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.thai: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.ko: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠成功壓制時。因為身體透支，要求遊戲開發部一定要將愛麗絲帶回來。遊戲開發部三人做了保證。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄成功压制时。因为身体透支，要求游戏开发部一定要将爱丽丝带回来。游戏开发部三人做了保证。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠成功压制时。因为身体透支，要求游戏开发部一定要将爱丽丝带回来。游戏开发部三人做了保证。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。
desc.zh_tw: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.en: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris would bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.jp: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris would bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.

desc.ko: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris would bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央出現，表示自己已經輸了。儘管如此，莉央仍然試圖警告老師愛麗絲將會帶來的危險，但老師認為莉央的舉動仍過於魯莽，不與他人討論而自主行動，與陽葵的意思基本一致。千尋此時也確認了愛麗絲的具體位置，三人立刻將愛麗絲救了出來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与日鞠的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与阳葵的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与阳葵的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Aris' personality was isolated in deep databases by Key, and it was Key acting right now. Key disconnected the comm and hacked Eridu, trying to make the city for her use; the army of Divi: Sion started gathering within the city. Rio apologized for her doings, and wanted Sensei to leave before Key finished it. Rio tried to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.
desc.jp: Aris' personality was isolated in deep databases by Key, and it was Key acting right now. Key disconnected the comm and hacked Eridu, trying to make the city for her use; the army of Divi: Sion started gathering within the city. Rio apologized for her doings, and wanted Sensei to leave before Key finished it. Rio tried to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲的人格被Key隔離在深層資料庫中，當前是Key正在行使職責。Key斷開了通訊訊號，併入侵了Eridu，試圖為其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也開始集中在都市中。莉央為自己的所作所為道歉，要求老師在Key得逞前離開，試圖以自己阻止一切過程。就在千鈞一髮之際，優香等人及時插手斷開了電源，Key發生錯誤而無法得逞。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了Eridu，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。莉央为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，优香等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了Eridu，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。莉央为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，优香等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
