In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.en: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.thai: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.ko: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_tw: C&C強大的夾攻成功讓季處於劣勢。季變更了埃裡都的結構，藉此孤立了寧瑠。另一方面，原本都很順利的遊戲開發部遇見了莉央的強大兵器前衛君。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C强大的夹攻成功让时处于劣势。时变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了尼禄。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C强大的夹攻成功让季处于劣势。季变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了宁瑠。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C强大的夹攻成功让季处于劣势。季变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了宁瑠。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。

desc.en: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.thai: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.ko: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_tw: 在C&C和季對峙的時候，莉央早已察覺到老師和遊戲開發部前來拯救愛麗絲，於是派遣強大的機器人前衛君去阻止遊戲開發部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在C&C和时对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在C&C和季对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在C&C和季对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。

desc.en: Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.jp: Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.thai: Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.ko: Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.zh_tw: C&C與季打的有來有回。季領悟到了C&C這一社團的不同之處，但她透過控制都市建築物的移動將寧瑠與其他成員隔離，讓其在毫無支援配合的情況下行動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C与时打的有来有回。时领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将尼禄与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C与季打的有来有回。季领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将宁瑠与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C与季打的有来有回。季领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将宁瑠与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.jp: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.

desc.ko: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.zh_tw: 與貝里塔斯的通訊突然中斷，取而代之的是莉央的問候。莉央對形式並不感到驚訝，並向老師提出了“電車難題”——同樣是在重複一開始“以少數者的傷亡換大多數的生存”的理論。桃井打斷了對話，闡明自己只想把愛麗絲帶回來。莉央見對話再無挽回，啟用了前衛君。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 与贝里塔斯的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉央的问候。莉央对形式并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃井打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉央见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 与贝里塔斯的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉央的问候。莉央对形式并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃井打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉央见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 与贝里塔斯的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉央的问候。莉央对形式并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃井打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉央见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。

desc.en: Though ugly, the firepower of the Avant Guard was not meant to be underestimated. The GDD and the ED lost the battle against Avant Guard at last.

desc.en: Since Neru was not there, it was then did everyone realize that it was the best time for the President to suppress Sensei. The President said it was all their doings and commanded Avant Guard to end all of this.
desc.jp: Since Neru was not there, it was then did everyone realize that it was the best time for the President to suppress Sensei. The President said it was all their doings and commanded Avant Guard to end all of this.
desc.thai: Since Neru was not there, it was then did everyone realize that it was the best time for the President to suppress Sensei. The President said it was all their doings and commanded Avant Guard to end all of this.
desc.ko: Since Neru was not there, it was then did everyone realize that it was the best time for the President to suppress Sensei. The President said it was all their doings and commanded Avant Guard to end all of this.
desc.zh_tw: 因為寧瑠不在身邊，眾人這才發現這正是會長壓制老師的最好時機。會長表示這正好是他們自己所造成，並命令前衛君終結這一切。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为尼禄不在身边，众人这才发现这正是会长压制老师的最好时机。会长表示这正好是他们自己所造成，并命令前卫君终结这一切。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为宁瑠不在身边，众人这才发现这正是会长压制老师的最好时机。会长表示这正好是他们自己所造成，并命令前卫君终结这一切。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为宁瑠不在身边，众人这才发现这正是会长压制老师的最好时机。会长表示这正好是他们自己所造成，并命令前卫君终结这一切。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.jp: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.thai: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.ko: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.zh_tw: 情況陷入絕望。正當大家灰心喪氣之際，仔細觀察寧瑠與季戰鬥的柚子挺身而出，提出能讓「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察尼禄与时战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察宁瑠与季战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察宁瑠与季战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。

desc.en: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro concluded the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.jp: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro concluded the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.thai: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro concluded the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.ko: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro concluded the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.zh_tw: 所有人撤退到了一幢較近的建築物中。千尋總結，C&C還不夠強，而且寧瑠尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已經累趴下了，而遊戲開發部的戰力甚至算不上什麼。大家都認為一切方法已經耗盡，所有人最不想見到的“Bad Ending”，如綠所言，已然到來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且尼禄尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且宁瑠尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且宁瑠尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。

desc.en: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity.
desc.jp: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity.
desc.thai: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity.
desc.ko: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠一聽“Bad Ending”突然就醒了過來。寧瑠強行支撐著，質問遊戲開發部的人“就只有這點決心嗎”，表示雖然受重傷，但同大家一樣，不能就此放棄、白費。而當桃井問出要如何應對時的時候，柚子講述了自己的發現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。尼禄强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。宁瑠强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。宁瑠强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。

desc.en: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage to Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then had a plan.
desc.jp: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage to Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then had a plan.
desc.thai: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage to Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then had a plan.
desc.ko: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage to Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then had a plan.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子確信寧瑠對季造成了傷害。千尋指出，季的機甲似乎無法同時計算墜落時的引數與攻擊引數，此時便出現了破綻。柚子詢問寧瑠是否是在近距離作戰時最優，寧瑠表達了肯定，而柚子則有了個計劃——他們可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子确信尼禄对时造成了伤害。千寻指出，时的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问尼禄是否是在近距离作战时最优，尼禄表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子确信宁瑠对季造成了伤害。千寻指出，季的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问宁瑠是否是在近距离作战时最优，宁瑠表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子确信宁瑠对季造成了伤害。千寻指出，季的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问宁瑠是否是在近距离作战时最优，宁瑠表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.thai: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.ko: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.zh_tw: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不見，C&C則迎接新成員，遊戲開發部再次開始研發下一部作品。千年再次恢復和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.

desc.zh_tw: 老師被叫到了遊戲開發部，眾人表示老師正在開發一款新的遊戲，因為之前的那個無法繼續擴充套件思路。愛麗絲邀請老師一起嘗試，眾人在愉快的氛圍下開始了遊戲。故事仍在續寫中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部正在尋找愛麗絲的行蹤。藉由乃愛和優香的協助後，調查出愛麗絲已經前往莉央創造的要塞都市「埃裡都」了。在潛入埃裡都之前，寧瑠提出一項作戰方案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由诺亚和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，尼禄提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。

desc.en: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.jp: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.thai: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.ko: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人聯絡了優香等人，優香聽聞愛麗絲被帶走一事大為驚訝。老師向研討會請求幫助，希望能確認愛麗絲的具體所在地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。

desc.en: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.

After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.

After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. desc.zh_tw: 不出老師所料，優香和乃愛找到了被刻意隱藏和刪除的財務記錄，就連優香都對此表示驚歎。在恢復並追蹤去向後，優香找到了一個叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，據稱正是會長所建。優香將座標傳送給眾人，並表示自己所處的立場不好給予更多協助後匆匆離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 不出老师所料，优香和诺亚找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。

desc.en: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.

desc.ko: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.zh_tw: 工程部認為都市的建造原料應該是從千年本地發出，因而只要找到前往都市的無人運送車，將他們置換成貨物裝進去即可。老師好奇工程部為何會願意參與此事，詠葉則表示會長帶走愛麗絲的“光之劍”本身已屬越權，某種意義上屬於對工程部宣戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。

desc.en: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.

desc.zh_tw: 解決了潛入問題，戰鬥和救援行動又重新擺上檯面來。綠和柚子簡單講述了時當時的情況，表示就像“作弊玩家”一樣快和敏捷。寧瑠罕見地提出了作戰計劃，表示既然主要目標就是將愛麗絲救出，那麼由她們去吸引火力，遊戲開發部和工程部趁機救出即可。貝里塔斯則表示會在後方提供通訊支援。

desc.en: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.

Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.

desc.zh_tw: 來到遊戲開發部的是研討會部長莉央。莉央說愛麗絲是「無名諸神的王女」，並說愛麗絲是魔王。雖然在場的所有人都很憤怒，但莉央很平靜地在談論愛麗絲可能會造成的未來。正當要爆發衝突時，C&C的第五個成員登場了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。

desc.en: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Nameless Army Divi: Sion, the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a metaphor with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.jp: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Nameless Army Divi: Sion, the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a metaphor with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.thai: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Nameless Army Divi: Sion, the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a metaphor with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.ko: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Nameless Army Divi: Sion, the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a metaphor with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央以最近發生的那件毀滅性事件為切入點，向眾人闡述了愛麗絲的真實身份：她並非什麼學生，而是Divi:Sion軍隊的指揮官、無名眾神的公主AL-1S。眾人無法接受這一解釋，而莉央則用遊戲作了簡單的闡述：愛麗絲是為了毀滅這個世界而生的“魔王”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了爱丽丝的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而莉央则用游戏作了简单的阐述：爱丽丝是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了爱丽丝的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而莉央则用游戏作了简单的阐述：爱丽丝是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。

desc.en: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones are partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.
desc.jp: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones are partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.

desc.zh_tw: 莉央向眾人道歉，表示讓愛麗絲接觸到那些機器人是她的失誤。儘管如此，會長表示此次非常幸運，因為愛麗絲接觸到的個體是比較不完整的，但強調之後或許就不會有如此運氣。莉央表示，此種方法只有一種解決方案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向众人道歉，表示让爱丽丝接触到那些机器人是她的失误。尽管如此，会长表示此次非常幸运，因为爱丽丝接触到的个体是比较不完整的，但强调之后或许就不会有如此运气。莉央表示，此种方法只有一种解决方案。

desc.en: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.
desc.jp: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. desc.zh_tw: 眾人與會長髮生了爭執。會長繼續闡述其解決方案：將愛麗絲的光環破壞掉，即殺死愛麗絲。此言一出甚至招致老師對其的不滿。莉央首先表示了對愛麗絲作為一臺機械卻擁有光環一事的驚訝，隨後與老師爭辯。爭辯無果，莉央叫來了一直在一旁的寧瑠清場。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的尼禄清场。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的宁瑠清场。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的宁瑠清场。

desc.en: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. Rio stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty angry at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.jp: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. Rio stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty angry at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.thai: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. Rio stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty angry at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.ko: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. Rio stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty angry at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央表示，C&C本就直屬她管理，某種意義上算她的保鏢。莉央強調眾人若不想受傷則不應做任何抵抗。然而寧瑠本身也對莉央的做法憤憤不平，因而開始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉寧瑠，並早就做好了應對手段。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央表示，C&C本就直属她管理，某种意义上算她的保镖。莉央强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而尼禄本身也对莉央的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉尼禄，并早就做好了应对手段。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央表示，C&C本就直属她管理，某种意义上算她的保镖。莉央强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而宁瑠本身也对莉央的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉宁瑠，并早就做好了应对手段。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央表示，C&C本就直属她管理，某种意义上算她的保镖。莉央强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而宁瑠本身也对莉央的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉宁瑠，并早就做好了应对手段。

desc.en: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.jp: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.thai: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.ko: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.zh_tw: 擊倒AMAS，寧瑠和季展開了追逐戰。但最後寧瑠卻因為遭到季襲擊而倒下，綠和柚子也因為突如其來的狀況而措手不及。看見這一切情景後，愛麗絲做出重大的決定，並且向在場的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击倒AMAS，尼禄和时展开了追逐战。但最后尼禄却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击倒AMAS，宁瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后宁瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击倒AMAS，宁瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后宁瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。

desc.en: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.jp: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.thai: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.ko: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉央無奈只能正式讓季開始壓制。切換了所謂“模式”的季動作達到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬間就將寧瑠打倒並壓制。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让时开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的时动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将尼禄打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将宁瑠打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将宁瑠打倒并压制。

desc.en: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.jp: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.

Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.ko: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠被壓制後，莉央指示AMAS去回收愛麗絲。柚子和綠試圖阻止，但遭莉央嚴厲警告。老師讓莉央住手，莉央反問老師作為大人更應理解她才對，但老師以“保護學生”為由爭論，遭到莉央的強烈質問。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师让莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师让莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师让莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。

desc.en: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others are nowhere near being a fault, and talked again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everyone and was afraid to harm anyone anymore. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.

Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everyone and was afraid to harm anyone anymore. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.thai: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others are nowhere near being a fault, and talked again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everyone and was afraid to harm anyone anymore. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.ko: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others are nowhere near being a fault, and talked again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everyone and was afraid to harm anyone anymore. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央強調犧牲一人為其他人的做法是正確的，並且再次申明瞭愛麗絲的身份。綠試圖以工程部的軌道炮為“勇者”的證明理論，但莉央遠端關閉了電源，這一證明被無效化。寧瑠在一旁督促愛麗絲不要放棄，但最終並未如願。愛麗絲會想起種種，擔心再給大家帶來傷害，最後同意與會長走，其他人雖然失落但也毫無他法。

desc.en: Aris accepted what Rio had said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝接受了莉央的话，并试图向大家重新解释，希望所有人能够理解她的选择。爱丽丝表达了对众人一直陪伴着她的谢意，表示自己一直以来都很开心。

desc.en: Not until Rio's left could anyone move even a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.

desc.zh_tw: 直到莉央走前，所有人都被壓制的死死的，一根手指頭都動不了。眾人被無力感壓垮。愛麗絲，就此不見。

desc.en: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.jp: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.thai: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.ko: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.zh_tw: 季原以為寧瑠會獨自去拯救愛麗絲，包含寧瑠在內的所有C&C成員都開始和季交戰。遊戲開發部一一擊敗了AMAS的成員，並且前往埃裡都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时原以为尼禄会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含尼禄在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季原以为宁瑠会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含宁瑠在内的所有C&C成员都开始和季交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 季原以为宁瑠会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含宁瑠在内的所有C&C成员都开始和季交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。

desc.en: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained their operation plan arrogantly, thinking that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from any fact.
desc.jp: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained their operation plan arrogantly, thinking that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from any fact.
desc.thai: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained their operation plan arrogantly, thinking that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from any fact.
desc.ko: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained their operation plan arrogantly, thinking that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from any fact.
desc.zh_tw: 季表示自己已經完全掌握了老師和C&C這邊的行動，奉勸C&C不要再做無謂抵抗。但C&C佯裝不懂，繼續發起攻擊。間隙，季傲慢地向C&C解析了他們的行動計劃，認為寧瑠會隨老師一起；但這並非事實。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，时傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为尼禄会随老师一起；但这并非事实。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，季傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为宁瑠会随老师一起；但这并非事实。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 季表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，季傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为宁瑠会随老师一起；但这并非事实。

desc.en: Toki was interrupted before she could finish. Neru said she was looking for revenge here and, even after that, it would be no late to rescue Aris.

desc.zh_tw: 季話都沒說完就被打斷。寧瑠表示自己是來複仇的，並且就算那樣後，救出愛麗絲也完全不遲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时话都没说完就被打断。尼禄表示自己是来复仇的，并且就算那样后，救出爱丽丝也完全不迟。

desc.en: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.

At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.
desc.zh_tw: 暴走的愛麗絲失去理智，破壞了部室且攻擊了在場的所有人。情況岌岌可危，沒有人能阻止愛麗絲。C&C突然現身讓愛麗絲昏厥，並且解決了可疑的機器人。正當覺得鬆一口氣時，老師從綠的口中得知出乎意料之外的訊息。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 暴走的爱丽丝失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止爱丽丝。C&C突然现身让爱丽丝昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从绿的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 暴走的爱丽丝失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止爱丽丝。C&C突然现身让爱丽丝昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从绿的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。

desc.en: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.jp: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.thai: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.ko: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.zh_tw: 因未能擊倒眾人，愛麗絲重新充能光之劍。真紀試圖阻攔，但遭愛麗絲反向壓制。就在眾人束手無策時，一個熟悉的聲音出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因未能击倒众人，爱丽丝重新充能光之剑。真纪试图阻拦，但遭爱丽丝反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因未能击倒众人，爱丽丝重新充能光之剑。真纪试图阻拦，但遭爱丽丝反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因未能击倒众人，爱丽丝重新充能光之剑。真纪试图阻拦，但遭爱丽丝反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.jp: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.thai: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.ko: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠聽見爆炸聲前來協助，C&C全體壓制了愛麗絲。就在寧瑠詢問老師事情的前因後果時，綠和柚子突然一臉驚愕地發現桃井受傷嚴重。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在尼禄询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在宁瑠询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。

desc.en: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.jp: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.thai: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.ko: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.zh_tw: C&C的成員以超乎預期的活躍表現擊退了季，遊戲開發部終於聚集在埃裡都的中央之塔前。但季再次現身，他在莉央的許可下啟動了決戰兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了时，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但时再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了季，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但季再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了季，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但季再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。

desc.en: Neru was entangled with Toki. Toki found that Neru was no easy opponent and was surprised to see that much of Neru's actions had escaped the calculations - the data were updating in real time and barely usable. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.
desc.jp: Neru was entangled with Toki. Toki found that Neru was no easy opponent and was surprised to see that much of Neru's actions had escaped the calculations - the data were updating in real time and barely usable. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.

Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.
desc.zh_tw: 時與寧瑠糾纏著。時發現寧瑠並非一個容易對付的對手，並驚訝的發現寧瑠的很多都逃脫了計算，資料基本上是實時更新而幾乎無法使用。與此同時，C&C的其他成員也從季設下的迷宮中走出，加入戰鬥。莉央此時指示時暫時撤退。因為時跑掉了，C&C決定先與老師集合。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时与尼禄纠缠着。时发现尼禄并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现尼禄的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从时设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 时与宁瑠纠缠着。时发现宁瑠并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现宁瑠的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从季设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时与宁瑠纠缠着。时发现宁瑠并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现宁瑠的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从季设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C. The two teams exchanged a few. Sensei confirmed the situation with Chihiro, but Toki appeared at this moment.
desc.jp: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C. The two teams exchanged a few. Sensei confirmed the situation with Chihiro, but Toki appeared at this moment.

desc.ko: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C. The two teams exchanged a few. Sensei confirmed the situation with Chihiro, but Toki appeared at this moment.
desc.zh_tw: 在千尋的指引下，遊戲開發部一行人順利來到了中心高塔的入口，正好遇到同樣前來的C&C。兩隊間交換了下具體情況。老師向千尋再次確認情報的準確性，但此刻季突然再次現身。

desc.en: Toki said they had already changed the plan, allowing Toki to use Abi-Eshuh, an exoskeleton suit. It fell from the sky, and Toki entered it like nothing. Toki started the system, and C&C began to engage.
desc.jp: Toki said they had already changed the plan, allowing Toki to use Abi-Eshuh, an exoskeleton suit. It fell from the sky, and Toki entered it like nothing. Toki started the system, and C&C began to engage.
desc.thai: Toki said they had already changed the plan, allowing Toki to use Abi-Eshuh, an exoskeleton suit. It fell from the sky, and Toki entered it like nothing. Toki started the system, and C&C began to engage.
desc.ko: Toki said they had already changed the plan, allowing Toki to use Abi-Eshuh, an exoskeleton suit. It fell from the sky, and Toki entered it like nothing. Toki started the system, and C&C began to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央表示他們已經改變了計劃，允許時使用Abi-Eshuh，一套外骨骼機甲。機甲應聲從天而降，季也熟練地進入了機甲，啟動了系統。C&C立刻開始應敵。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央表示他们已经改变了计划，允许时使用Abi-Eshuh，一套外骨骼机甲。机甲应声从天而降，时也熟练地进入了机甲，启动了系统。C&C立刻开始应敌。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央表示他们已经改变了计划，允许时使用Abi-Eshuh，一套外骨骼机甲。机甲应声从天而降，季也熟练地进入了机甲，启动了系统。C&C立刻开始应敌。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央表示他们已经改变了计划，允许时使用Abi-Eshuh，一套外骨骼机甲。机甲应声从天而降，季也熟练地进入了机甲，启动了系统。C&C立刻开始应敌。

desc.en: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.jp: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.thai: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.ko: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.zh_tw: 老師原本在照顧失去意識的桃井，接獲綠的聯絡後，便去找窩在遊戲開發部的愛麗絲。儘管老師給予了安慰，但愛麗絲依舊因為自己傷害了桃井而很自責。就在那個時候，出乎預料的人物現身告知了「真相」。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃井，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃井而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃井，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃井而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃井，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃井而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。

desc.en: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris hovered over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the things provided by everyone.
desc.jp: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris hovered over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the things provided by everyone.
desc.thai: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris hovered over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the things provided by everyone.
desc.ko: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris hovered over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the things provided by everyone.
desc.zh_tw: 在與愛麗絲的混戰中，桃井不幸倒地。雖然及時送到了夏萊的醫務室，但幾天後仍未甦醒。關於愛麗絲的謎團如陰雲般籠罩著每個人的心頭，老師開始回憶起所有人提供的資訊與線索。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在与爱丽丝的混战中，桃井不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了夏莱的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于爱丽丝的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在与爱丽丝的混战中，桃井不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了夏莱的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于爱丽丝的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在与爱丽丝的混战中，桃井不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了夏莱的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于爱丽丝的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.thai: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.ko: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。
desc.zh_tw: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: Yuzu and Midori asked help from Sensei for the fact that Aris kept locking herself up in the club room. Sensei called once softly, and walked in despite no response.
desc.jp: Yuzu and Midori asked help from Sensei for the fact that Aris kept locking herself up in the club room. Sensei called once softly, and walked in despite no response.
desc.thai: Yuzu and Midori asked help from Sensei for the fact that Aris kept locking herself up in the club room. Sensei called once softly, and walked in despite no response.
desc.ko: Yuzu and Midori asked help from Sensei for the fact that Aris kept locking herself up in the club room. Sensei called once softly, and walked in despite no response.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子和綠向老師請求協助，愛麗絲一直待在遊戲開發部的活動室裡不肯出來。老師輕輕喊了一聲，見沒回應便走了進去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子和绿向老师请求协助，爱丽丝一直待在游戏开发部的活动室里不肯出来。老师轻轻喊了一声，见没回应便走了进去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子和绿向老师请求协助，爱丽丝一直待在游戏开发部的活动室里不肯出来。老师轻轻喊了一声，见没回应便走了进去。

desc.en: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.jp: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.thai: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.ko: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲對自己給眾人，尤其是桃井的傷害自責不已。愛麗絲表示自己也不清楚發生了什麼，但身體卻自動做出了反應，如同隱藏的存檔被啟用一般。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝对自己给众人，尤其是桃井的伤害自责不已。爱丽丝表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝对自己给众人，尤其是桃井的伤害自责不已。爱丽丝表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝对自己给众人，尤其是桃井的伤害自责不已。爱丽丝表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。

desc.en: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.jp: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.thai: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.

desc.zh_tw: 被莉央監禁的陽葵。兩人依舊走在平行線上。另一方面，潛入埃裡都拯救愛麗絲的遊戲開發部和工程師部遇見了莉央創造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 被莉央监禁的阳葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 被莉央监禁的阳葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。

desc.en: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.jp: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.thai: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.ko: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.zh_tw: C&C的成員們依照作戰華麗地擊倒了AMAS。C&C的第五個成員季阻止了勢如破竹的他們。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员时阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员季阻止了势如破竹的他们。

desc.en: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the detection system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.jp: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the detection system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.

desc.zh_tw: 陽葵對莉央將愛麗絲綁架回來並破壞光環一事感到噁心。莉央則仍希望陽葵能理解她，並表示陽葵和老師等人的反抗毫無意義。通訊間隙，都市的檢測系統已經發現了老師一行人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠对莉央将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉央则仍希望日鞠能理解她，并表示日鞠和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。

desc.en: The Engineering Department, Game Development Development and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.

desc.zh_tw: 工程部、遊戲開發部和老師安全抵達都市的地下貨運通道，對貝里塔斯的駭客技術大為震撼。這時一群AMAS機器人擋住了他們的去路，眾人立刻開始迎戰。

desc.en: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.
desc.jp: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.

desc.zh_tw: 送走愛麗絲後，千年的學生們都不知該如何是好，原本受傷的桃井突然現身說不能坐以待斃，而且提議要一起去拯救愛麗絲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 送走爱丽丝后，千年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃井突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 送走爱丽丝后，千年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃井突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 送走爱丽丝后，千年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃井突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救爱丽丝。

desc.en: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.jp: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.thai: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.ko: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.zh_tw: 老師與遊戲開發部、工程部與C&C分析當前形勢。眾人一致同意愛麗絲被帶走屬於緊急事件，而寧瑠則從始至終都無法理解其中的緣由，眾人開始重新梳理。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师与游戏开发部、工程部与C&C分析当前形势。众人一致同意爱丽丝被带走属于紧急事件，而尼禄则从始至终都无法理解其中的缘由，众人开始重新梳理。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师与游戏开发部、工程部与C&C分析当前形势。众人一致同意爱丽丝被带走属于紧急事件，而宁瑠则从始至终都无法理解其中的缘由，众人开始重新梳理。

desc.en: Rio told Aris that her real identity was in fact a "demon lord", and said that the only way to solve this was to destroy her halo. Yuzu and Midori believed the situation was untrue but words failed them. It was at this moment when Momoi showed up.
desc.jp: Rio told Aris that her real identity was in fact a "demon lord", and said that the only way to solve this was to destroy her halo. Yuzu and Midori believed the situation was untrue but words failed them. It was at this moment when Momoi showed up.

desc.zh_tw: 莉央向愛麗絲闡述愛麗絲實為“魔王”的身份，並表示只有破壞光環才能達成她的目的。柚子和綠堅信愛麗絲決不是這樣，但卻不好表達，就在這時桃井出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向爱丽丝阐述爱丽丝实为“魔王”的身份，并表示只有破坏光环才能达成她的目的。柚子和绿坚信爱丽丝决不是这样，但却不好表达，就在这时桃井出现。

desc.en: Momoi appeared out of nowhere. Midori couldn't help but throw herself into Momoi's arms and wept. After knowing what happened, though hard to express feelings, Momoi said it was unacceptable and was determined to rescue Aris back. Everyone agreed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.

Everyone agreed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井突然出現，綠立刻撲到了姐姐的懷裡哭泣。桃井在聽了事情經過後，表示雖然不好言說自己的感受，但她知道這一切都不可接受，並且表示一定要將愛麗絲救回來。大家都表示了贊同，寧瑠甚至還表揚了桃井大膽敢說的性格。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井突然出现，绿立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃井在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将爱丽丝救回来。大家都表示了赞同，尼禄甚至还表扬了桃井大胆敢说的性格。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井突然出现，绿立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃井在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将爱丽丝救回来。大家都表示了赞同，宁瑠甚至还表扬了桃井大胆敢说的性格。

desc.en: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.jp: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.thai: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.ko: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.zh_tw: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力讓大家都相當驚訝。在朱音的建議下，老師和寧瑠找出了弱點，企圖把戰鬥引導為空中戰。但季似乎早已預料到這一點，活躍的表現讓寧瑠受到重傷，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在茜的建议下，老师和尼禄找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但时似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让尼禄受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在朱音的建议下，老师和宁瑠找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但季似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让宁瑠受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在朱音的建议下，老师和宁瑠找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但季似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让宁瑠受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。

desc.en: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.jp: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.

On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.ko: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.zh_tw: C&C沒對這個機甲造成一點傷害，千尋報告了這點。同時千尋還注意到，都市的全部電力和算力都集中在了這套機甲上，使它幾乎甚至可以確定未來。聽聞此話的遊戲開發部眾人紛紛表示“這不和作弊一樣？！”老師對此毫無辦法，而這時朱音突然指出，這套裝甲是為地面作戰設計。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时茜突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时朱音突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时朱音突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。

desc.en: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.
desc.jp: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.

desc.zh_tw: 老師突然意識到了什麼，命令寧瑠將戰場轉移到房頂上。莉央表示轉移到樓頂同樣沒有，但老師笑而不語。季向寧瑠開炮，炸掉了房頂，兩人從空中摔落。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令尼禄将战场转移到房顶上。莉央表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。时向尼禄开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令宁瑠将战场转移到房顶上。莉央表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。季向宁瑠开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令宁瑠将战场转移到房顶上。莉央表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。季向宁瑠开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.thai: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 老师的意图此时终于表现出来：既然是为地面作战设计，在空中又怎么样呢？事实证明的确如此。虽然只有一瞬间的时间，但柚子已经完全注意到了其弱点所在。Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.jp: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.thai: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.ko: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠最終還是沒能勝利。莉央指示時回收老師，但此時機體卻出現了一絲破綻，千尋讓桃井抓住機會對其攻擊，成功讓眾人先行撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄最终还是没能胜利。莉央指示时回收老师，但此时机体却出现了一丝破绽，千寻让桃井抓住机会对其攻击，成功让众人先行撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠最终还是没能胜利。莉央指示时回收老师，但此时机体却出现了一丝破绽，千寻让桃井抓住机会对其攻击，成功让众人先行撤退。

desc.en: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.

On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.

desc.zh_tw: 有一天，老師從貝里塔斯接獲發現可疑機器的訊息。前往貝里塔斯部室的途中，老師和遊戲開發部相遇，便一起調查機器的來歷。但大家都無法對機器的來歷做出結論…突然間，愛麗絲就像是被吸引般伸出手觸碰機器，機器啟動的同時，愛麗絲也發生了異變。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在千年廣場遇到了其他千年的學生，大家都很高興見到她。中途愛麗絲還收到了幾個支線任務，被以報酬的名義贈送了點心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在校園裡見到了工程部三人，後者表示是出來蒐羅新裝備的。詠葉問愛麗絲光之劍近況如何，愛麗絲則表示在很愛護地使用著。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。歌原问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.

Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲叫寧瑠“小不點”讓後者頗為不滿，但還是拽著老師和愛麗絲到了遊戲廳。不出所料，寧瑠不斷輸給了愛麗絲，儘管愛麗絲已經教了她相當一段時間。寧瑠雖然非常惱火愛麗絲評價她的水平不好，但還是請教愛麗絲連招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝叫尼禄“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，尼禄不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。尼禄虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.jp: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.thai: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.ko: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.zh_tw: 因為大家齊心協力的關係，千年的學生成功擊敗了季，代號Double O的寧瑠的活躍表現也爭取到了最後的勝利。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千年的学生成功击败了时，代号Double O的尼禄的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千年的学生成功击败了季，代号Double O的宁瑠的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。

desc.en: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.
desc.jp: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.

desc.zh_tw: C&C一行人繼續與季和她的機甲戰鬥。季起初非常自信，但很快發現自己的攻擊似乎也開始無效化。C&C開始以直覺統籌戰鬥，最終將時逼進了室內。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C一行人继续与时和她的机甲战斗。时起初非常自信，但很快发现自己的攻击似乎也开始无效化。C&C开始以直觉统筹战斗，最终将时逼进了室内。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.thai: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.jp: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.thai: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.ko: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人都對柚子的假設與計劃表示懷疑，但寧瑠不僅表示了肯定，而且還誇讚了她曾經為救朋友所表現出的無謂氣魄。朱音擔心寧瑠身上的傷，但後者表示單靠毅力就能支撐。最終所有人同意此次作戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但尼禄不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。茜担心尼禄身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但宁瑠不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。朱音担心宁瑠身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。

desc.en: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. Dust settled, even Rio was surprised by her own irrational choice, but still claimed that the probability of Sensei's winning was nearly zero. She didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.
desc.jp: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. desc.zh_tw: 莉央對老師的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意識到了什麼。莉央授權時發射主炮，將寧瑠打倒。塵埃落定，就連莉央也對自己非理性的選擇感到驚訝，並且同時繼續嘴硬聲稱老師成功的概率為零，並對所有人在此種條件下仍繼續作戰感到不解。朱音則解釋稱，老師從來，以及他們作戰，從來就沒有談過勝率云云。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉央授权时发射主炮，将尼禄打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉央也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。茜则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉央授权时发射主炮，将宁瑠打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉央也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。朱音则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。
